MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-NOV-2020 14:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY17 postcode area of Caersws ,affecting properties in Llanwnog, Clatter, Pontdolgoch and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  further investigation needed following unconfirmed reports of a grounded cable and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:54 AM on 8th November 2020..
